details.name: Amanhã
details.expression: (function(){var a = new Date(); a.setDate(a.getDate()+1); return a;})()

details.name: Ontem
details.expression: (function(){var a = new Date(); a.setDate(a.getDate()-1); return a;})()

details.name: Depois de Amanhã
details.expression: (function(){var a = new Date(); a.setDate(a.getDate()+2); return a;})()

details.name: Segunda-Feira
details.expression: (function(){var day_index = 1; var now = new Date(); var index = now.getDay() - day_index; if(index <0){ index = index*-1;}  if(day_index <= now.getDay()){now.setDate(now.getDate()+ (7-index)); return now;} else { now.setDate(now.getDate() + index); return now;}})()

details.name: Terça-Feira
details.expression: (function(){var day_index = 2; var now = new Date(); var index = now.getDay() - day_index; if(index <0){ index = index*-1;}  if(day_index <= now.getDay()){now.setDate(now.getDate()+ (7-index)); return now;} else { now.setDate(now.getDate() + index); return now;}})()

details.name: Domingo
details.expression: (function(){var day_index = 0; var now = new Date(); var index = now.getDay() - day_index; if(index <0){ index = index*-1;}  if(day_index <= now.getDay()){now.setDate(now.getDate()+ (7-index)); return now;} else { now.setDate(now.getDate() + index); return now;}})()
